name: .EWC2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .EWC2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You cannot open an EWC2 file by itself in EDIUS. Instead, you should open the audio file associated with your EWC2 file. When you import the audio file into an EDIUS project, your EWC2 file will appear in EDIUS's video editing timeline.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
